content.p: Sooda (Simple Object-Oriented Data Access) is an Object-To-Relational Mapping software for the .NET environment. It lets you automatically generate an object-oriented data access layer (DAL) for your application. Instead of writing SQL code, you can now focus on writing business rules in object-oriented .NET languages.

p.p: Sooda is an open source software distributed under the terms of the BSD license. SoodaQuery tool is distributed under the terms of GPL v2, because it makes use of the ICSharpCode.TextEditor.dll component which is GPL.

content.p: Sooda supports the following O/R features:

ul.li: clean and natural syntax - the amount of boilerplate code is reduced to the absolute minimum, the code is readable and maintainable
support for any data type supported by the .NET Framework
natural mapping of one-to-many relations as referenced objects and collections. View Sample
natural mapping of many-to-many relations as collections
heterogenous data access (including RDBMS, XML files, Web services, LDAP & AD directories)
differential XML serialization and deserialization for moving data across layers
optimistic locking and object versioning with collision detection

content.p: Sooda supports Microsoft .NET Framework version 1.0 or later and Mono.
